original_query: SELECT c.PostId, c.UserId FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND b.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-01 19:11:47' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 13:42:51' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND v.VoteTypeId=2 AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-08-02 12:24:29' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT comments.postid AS E1_postid,comments.userid AS E1_userid FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.creationdate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-01 19:11:47' AND comments.creationdate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 13:42:51'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT postlinks.relatedpostid AS E3_relatedpostid FROM postlinks AS postlinks WHERE CAST(postlinks.linktypeid AS INTEGER) = 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_0 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.E1_postid=E3.E3_relatedpostid)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT badges.userid AS E6_userid FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-02 12:24:29'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_1 AS SELECT * FROM E1_stage1_0 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1_stage1_0.E1_userid=E6.E6_userid)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT posts.id AS E2_id FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.answercount <= 4 AND posts.favoritecount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_2 AS SELECT * FROM E1_stage1_1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1_stage1_1.E1_postid=E2.E2_id)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT votes.postid AS E5_postid FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.votetypeid AS INTEGER) = 2 AND votes.creationdate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_3 AS SELECT * FROM E1_stage1_2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1_stage1_2.E1_postid=E5.E5_postid)
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT users.id AS E7_id FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_4 AS SELECT * FROM E1_stage1_3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7 WHERE E1_stage1_3.E1_userid=E7.E7_id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT posthistory.postid AS E4_postid FROM posthistory AS posthistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage1_5 AS SELECT * FROM E1_stage1_4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1_stage1_4.E1_postid=E4.E4_postid)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage1_5 WHERE E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E3.E3_relatedpostid)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E6_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage1_5 WHERE E1_stage1_5.E1_userid=E6.E6_userid)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage1_5 WHERE E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E2.E2_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage1_5 WHERE E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E5.E5_postid)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E7_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E7 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage1_5 WHERE E1_stage1_5.E1_userid=E7.E7_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1_stage1_5 WHERE E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E4.E4_postid)

CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E_stage3 AS SELECT E1_stage1_5.E1_postid AS E1_postid, E1_stage1_5.E1_userid AS E1_userid FROM E1_stage1_5, E3_stage2_0, E6_stage2_0, E2_stage2_0, E5_stage2_0, E7_stage2_0, E4_stage2_0 WHERE E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E3_stage2_0.E3_relatedpostid AND E1_stage1_5.E1_userid=E6_stage2_0.E6_userid AND E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E2_stage2_0.E2_id AND E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E5_stage2_0.E5_postid AND E1_stage1_5.E1_userid=E7_stage2_0.E7_id AND E1_stage1_5.E1_postid=E4_stage2_0.E4_postid
SELECT * FROM E_stage3
